hero-description: 내면의 창의력을 발휘하세요. Vignette는 가상 스트리밍을 위한 오픈 소스, 모듈식 스트리밍 툴킷입니다.
design-p: Combining the best of thoughtful design, machine learning, and a open ecosystem, Vignette is a next-generation toolkit for streaming. And all you need is a camera.
plugins-p: Vignette is designed with extensibility in mind. Want something? There's definitely an extension for it.
transparency-p: Vignette is made with the community in mind. This is why Vignette is licensed and created with openness and transparency in mind.
